====== Site visit

|===
|Property | Value

|Identifier | `urn:shapes:basal-area-basal-wedge-protocol-shapes:basal-area-count:site-visit`
|Label | Site visit
|Definition | Observations _MUST_ have a value for `tern:hasSiteVisit`.
